oai_dc:dc.dc:title: M. G. Scarlett, 1920-
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A biographical sketch of MTSU President Melvin G. Scarlett. Caption text: Born December 30, 1920 at Reading, Pennsylvania, he is the son of Clarence Albert and Mossie Ann (Ritzman) Scarlett. He received his education at Catawba College in North Carolina, the University of Florida, and Oklahoma State University. At the age of forty-eight he came from the presidency of Farmington State College in Maine to be the fifth president of Middle Tennessee State University. Since 1979 he has been Regents Professor at Memphis State University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Scarlett, Melvin G.; College presidents; Middle Tennessee State University
